about_the_game:
PIXELS is the new way of pixel battles.

Features


  • One world canvas
Players from all over the world paint on one scalable canvas.

  • Watch where the players are
Press TAB to see all the cursors. And other additional data.

  • SUPER PIXELS
The brand-new animated pixels.


  • Not just ONE pixel
You get a limit of 100 pixels and 10 super pixels. Cooldown depends on number of players.


  • Quick paint mode
Just press SHIFT and create.


  • Community features
Teams, users and ratings with leaderboard.


Share your art to the world.

content_descriptors.notes: May contain swearing, coarse language, and implicit scenes of a sexual nature, explicit erotica and nudity.

detailed_description:
Join our Discord community

There you can share your pixel art, find a team, report bugs and keep up with all the news!


About the Game

PIXELS is the new way of pixel battles.

Features


  • One world canvas
Players from all over the world paint on one scalable canvas.

  • Watch where the players are
Press TAB to see all the cursors. And other additional data.

  • SUPER PIXELS
The brand-new animated pixels.


  • Not just ONE pixel
You get a limit of 100 pixels and 10 super pixels. Cooldown depends on number of players.


  • Quick paint mode
Just press SHIFT and create.


  • Community features
Teams, users and ratings with leaderboard.


Share your art to the world.
legal_notice:

Please read this EULA carefully, as it sets out the basis upon which we license the Game for use.
By clicking "accept agreement" when you first install the Game, you agree to be bound by the provisions of this EULA. Upon returning the Game and providing proof of purchase, you will be entitled to a refund.
By agreeing to be bound by this EULA, you warrant to us that you are at least 16 years of age; if you are not, you must not use the Game.
WARNING: The light patterns in some video games may trigger epileptic seizures or blackouts in a very small number of individuals. If you have an epileptic condition, you should consult a medical professional before playing the Game. If you experience dizziness, muscle twitching, changes to vision, disorientation, seizures, convulsions and/or any involuntary movements while playing the Game, you should immediately stop playing and consult a medical professional.

"Game" means PIXELS, as modified, patched, updated and upgraded from time to time by or with the authorisation of the Licensor, including any DLC;

"Permitted Hardware" means any desktop, laptop or tablet computer that is owned by and in the physical control of the User and meets the minimum hardware requirements for the Game published by the Licensor from time to time;

5.1 In addition to this EULA, the Distribution Platform Terms and Conditions may affect the rights, obligations and liabilities of the User in relation to the Game.

11.1 Upon the termination of this EULA, all of the provisions of this EULA shall cease to have effect, save that the following provisions of this EULA shall survive and continue to have effect (in accordance with their express terms or otherwise indefinitely): Clauses 1, 5, 9, 11 and 12.

13. Service Availability

14.User-Generated Content

14.1 The Licensor and its administrators reserve the right to remove or delete user-generated content, including but not limited to in-game assets, text, images, videos, or any other form of content, at their discretion. Additionally, other users of the platform may have the ability to remove of delete user-generated content.
14.2 Users are encouraged to report any content they believe violates the terms of service or community guidelines. Our administrators will review and take appropriate action based on reported content.

15. Content Creation Rules

15.1 Users are required to comply with all applicable laws and regulations when creating content in the Game. This includes respecting copyright laws and prohibiting the creation of content that infringes on the intellectual property of others.
15.2 It is prohibited to create content that contains profanity, insults, threats, or any other content that may violate decency standards and create a negative gaming environment.
15.3 User must respect the rights and feelings of other players. This includes a prohibition on creating content that may be offensive, derogatory, or discriminatory based on race, gender, religion, nationality, orientation, or any other characteristics.
15.4 Creating content that threatens the safety or violates the privacy of other players, including the disclosure of personal information, is strictly prohibited.
15.5 Users are obligated to adhere to the official rules of the Game and not create content that disrupts gameplay or provides an unfair advantage.
15.6 Licensor reserves the right to moderate and remove content that does not comply with these content creation rules. User may also have the ability to report inappropriate content.
15.7 Users who violate the Content Creation Rules, as outlined in the "Content Creation Rules" section of this EULA, may face sanctions, including temporary or permanent account suspension. The duration of suspension may vary and could include one hour, one day, three weeks, or permanent suspension, depending on the severity and frequency of the content creation violations.

16. User Ratings and Reviews

16.1 User have the ability to rate other users, adding to their overall rating. User ratings are public and can be found in the 'User' section within the game as well as within the Game's Steam community. By participating in this rating system, users acknowledge that their ratings may be visible to others and that they are expected to use this feature in a fair and respectful manner.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 13
  • Processor: Apple Silicon
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: PIXELS

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: PIXELS is the new way of pixel battles. Share your art to the world on a huge canvas. NOW OFFLINE!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Swedish, Japanese
